trans-unit.source: A runtime object that references a speech recognition grammar, which an application can use to define the constraints for speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 一个运行时对象引用语音识别语法，应用程序可以用于定义的语音识别的约束。

trans-unit.source: A speech recognition grammar is a set of rules or constraints that define what a speech recognition engine can recognize as meaningful input.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别语法是一套规则或语音识别引擎将可以识别为有意义的输入定义的约束。

trans-unit.source: For more information about creating and using speech recognition grammars, see [Speech Recognition](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919), [Create Grammars Using XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1), [Create Grammars Using GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae), and [Create Grammars Using SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906).
trans-unit.target: 有关创建和使用语音识别语法的详细信息，请参阅[语音识别](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/6a7dc524-07fc-4862-8d48-8c10dc64b919)，[创建语法使用 XML](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/2d799487-49c6-4cc9-b42f-f71cd3824fe1)，[创建语法使用 GrammarBuilder](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/7e2cc577-cb05-4318-9da3-7c8675d3d9ae)，和[创建语法使用 SrgsGrammar](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/e4d9f96e-2241-4c39-b9e0-ac9ef4e9a906)。

trans-unit.source: After you author a grammar, you must build it into a Grammar object that a speech recognition engine can load and that your application can use at runtime to manage speech recognition.
trans-unit.target: 创作语法后，你必须在它构建到语音识别引擎可加载和你的应用程序可用于在运行时管理语音识别的语法对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor to create a Grammar instance from a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> or a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> object, or from a file or a <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains a description of a grammar in a supported format.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数来创建语法实例从<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>对象，或从文件或<xref:System.IO.Stream>包含受支持的格式语法的说明。</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Supported formats include the following: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension Grammar constructors that accept XML-format grammar files in their arguments compile the XML grammars to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 支持的格式如下:-符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) -已编译为具有.cfg 的二进制文件的语法文件扩展语法构造函数接受其自变量中的 XML 格式语法文件编译到由语音识别引擎针对加载和使用进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 语法。

trans-unit.source: You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a Grammar object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以减少通过提前，编译语法构造中的 XML 格式语法的语法对象所需的时间量使用之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>

trans-unit.source: An application's speech recognition engine, as managed by a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object, can load multiple speech recognition grammars.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序的语音识别引擎，为托管由<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>对象，可以加载多个语音识别语法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>

trans-unit.source: The application can independently enable or disable individual grammars by setting the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A> property, and modify recognition behavior through Grammar properties, such as the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序可以单独启用或禁用各个语法，通过设置<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>属性，并如修改通过语法属性，识别行为<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A>属性。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Enabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The grammar’s <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized> event is raised when input matches a path through the grammar.
trans-unit.target: 语法的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>输入匹配通过语法的路径时引发事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.SpeechRecognized>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is a best practice to verify the safety of any URI or DLL used to build a Grammar object.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 验证任何 URI 或用于生成语法对象的 DLL 的安全最佳做法是。

trans-unit.source: > > Windows and the Speech platform provide security for applications constructing a Grammar instance from a DLL or from a grammar that supports scripting.
trans-unit.target: >> Windows 和语音平台提供了构建语法实例从 DLL 或支持脚本语法的应用程序的安全性。

trans-unit.source: > > Scripts in Grammar objects are always run as if downloaded from a web page in the `Internet Zone`.
trans-unit.target: >> 就像从网页下载，始终运行语法对象中的脚本`Internet Zone`。

trans-unit.source: The Common Language Runtime (CLR) isolates any DLL loaded to obtain a grammar definition.
trans-unit.target: 公共语言运行时 (CLR) 将加载以获取语法定义的任何 DLL 隔离开来。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> class
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>类

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> class from a <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>从一种<xref:System.IO.Stream>。</xref:System.IO.Stream>类

trans-unit.source: This constructor does not pass any parameters to the initialization handler, and the description should not define an initialization handler that requires arguments.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数不将任何参数传递给初始化的处理程序，并描述不应定义一个初始化处理程序需要的自变量。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instance from the following formats: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可以创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>实例从以下格式:-符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) -在已编译为二进制文件的语法文件.cfg 文件扩展名为此构造函数将编译到由语音识别引擎针对加载和使用进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以减少构造所需的时间量<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象从通过编译语法，请提前使用之一的 XML 格式语法<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A>方法。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: An SRGS grammar can define a root rule.
trans-unit.target: SRGS 语法可以定义根规则。

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a stream and specify a root rule, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>从流对象和指定根规则，请使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>或<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from a stream and specify a base URI to use to resolve relative rule references, use the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>从流对象，并指定要用于解析相对规则引用的基 URI 使用<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: This constructor can create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instance from the following formats: - XML-format files that conform to the W3C [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) - Grammars that have been compiled to a binary file with a .cfg file extension This constructor compiles XML-format grammar files to a binary format to optimize them for loading and consumption by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数可以创建<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>实例从以下格式:-符合 W3C 的 XML 格式文件[语音识别语法规范 (SRGS) 版本 1.0](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761) -在已编译为二进制文件的语法文件.cfg 文件扩展名为此构造函数将编译到由语音识别引擎针对加载和使用进行优化的二进制格式的 XML 格式语法文件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: You can reduce the amount of time required to construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an XML-format grammar by compiling the grammar in advance, using one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsGrammarCompiler.Compile%2A> methods.

trans-unit.source: Parameters for an initialization handler may also be specified.

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be null.

trans-unit.source: Parameters for an initialization handler may also be specified.
trans-unit.target: 此外可以指定的初始化处理程序的参数。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> that contains the constraints for the speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>包含语音识别语法的约束。

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the rule to use as the entry point of the speech recognition grammar, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> to use the default root rule of the grammar description.
trans-unit.target: 要作为入口点的语音识别语法中，使用的规则的标识符或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>若要使用的语法说明的默认根规则。

trans-unit.source: The base URI to use to resolve any relative rule reference in the grammar description, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 要用于解析在语法描述中，任何相对规则引用的基 URI 或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to the initialization handler specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*> property for the entry point or the root rule of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> to be created.This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: 要传递到初始化的处理程序的入口点或的根规则<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*>属性指定参数<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>要创建。此参数可以为 null。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsRule.OnInit*>

trans-unit.source: - Any of the parameters contain an invalid value.
trans-unit.target: -任何参数包含无效的值。

trans-unit.source: - The specified by srgsDocument does not contain the rule specified in ruleName.
trans-unit.target: - 指定的 srgsDocument 不包含在指定的规则 ruleName 。

trans-unit.source: - The contents of the array parameters do not match the arguments of any of the rule's initialization handlers.
trans-unit.target: 的数组参数内容不匹配任何规则的初始化的处理程序的自的变量。

trans-unit.source: - The grammar has a relative rule reference that cannot be resolved by the default base rule for grammars or the URI supplied by baseUri.
trans-unit.target: -语法具有无法解析的默认基的相对规则引用语法或由提供的 URI 规则 baseUri 。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> can be used by a speech recognizer to perform recognition.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，控制是否<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>语音识别器可以用于执行识别。

trans-unit.source: An instance of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be enabled or disabled independently of being loaded by a speech recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>可能启用或禁用独立于被语音识别引擎加载。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Enabled" name="Enabled" href=""></xref> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a speech recognizer can perform recognition using the speech recognition grammar; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Enabled" name="Enabled" href=""> </xref>属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果语音识别器可以执行识别使用语音识别语法; 否则该属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether a grammar is strongly typed.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否强类型的语法。

trans-unit.source: A strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application.
trans-unit.target: 一个强类型<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象 (`IsStg`等于`true`) 可以返回到客户端应用程序的强类型的结果 （对象，而不是原始文本）。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return <xref:System.DateTime> objects rather than raw recognized input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能会返回强类型的语法<xref:System.DateTime>对象而不是原始识别的输入。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将代码附加到的语法规则实现强类型的语法。

trans-unit.source: As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects.
trans-unit.target: 识别引擎处理任何给定的规则，拍摄作为输入当前部分结果、 执行关联的代码和文本信息变得丰富类型对象。

trans-unit.source: This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic.
trans-unit.target: 这允许客户端更轻松地使用增强的语义检查，支持针对多个区域性和内部语法逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Instances of strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a <xref:System.Type> of the Common Language Runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: 强类型的实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象通常从一个程序集作为中的资源中获取<xref:System.Type>的公共语言运行时 (CLR)。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 用于支持不同语言的本地化的类型是这样的示例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsStg" name="IsStg" href=""></xref> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the grammar is strongly-typed; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_IsStg" name="IsStg" href=""> </xref>属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果语法是强类型; 否则该属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets whether a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> has been loaded by a speech recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 获取是否<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>语音识别器已加载。

trans-unit.source: Once a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> has been loaded, the values of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> cannot be changed.
trans-unit.target: 一次<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>已加载的值<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>不能更改。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Weight%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Loaded" name="Loaded" href=""></xref> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the referenced speech recognition grammar is currently loaded in a speech recognizer; otherwise the property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Loaded" name="Loaded" href=""> </xref>属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果引用的语音识别语法当前已加载在语音识别器; 否则该属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""></xref> method returns a localized instance of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object derived from <xref:System.Type>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""> </xref>方法返回的本地化的实例<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象派生自<xref:System.Type>.</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Localized grammars obtained with `LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType` are typically strongly-typed (see <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.IsStg%2A> for more information on strongly typed grammars).
trans-unit.target: 本地化使用获取语法`LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType`是通常强类型 (请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.IsStg%2A>为强类型的语法的详细信息)。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.IsStg%2A>

trans-unit.source: If `onInitParameters` is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic) the localized grammar should have either no initialization method, or a method that takes no arguments.
trans-unit.target: 如果`onInitParameters`为空引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing) 的本地化语法应具有初始化方法或不带任何参数的方法。

trans-unit.source: In an assembly, the <xref:System.Type> of an object based on <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 在程序集中，<xref:System.Type>的基于对象的<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to an initialization method of the localizedobject based on <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 参数传递给 localizedobject 初始化方法基于<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: 此参数可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""></xref> method returns a valid object based on <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if there has been an error.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" name="LoadLocalizedGrammarFromType" href=""> </xref>方法返回有效的对象基于<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>，或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果已出错。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的名称<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""></xref> property returns the name of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Name" name="Name" href=""> </xref>属性返回的名称<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the priority value of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的优先级值<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The `Priority` property is used to select a grammar when more than one grammar will produce an identical recognition result.
trans-unit.target: `Priority`属性用于在多个语法将生成相同的识别结果时选择语法。

trans-unit.source: If a speech recognizer has more than one speech recognition grammar loaded and enabled that match the input, and the match is the best result from the recognizer, then the recognizer uses the grammar that has the highest `Priority`.
trans-unit.target: 如果语音识别器具有多个语音识别语法加载并启用符合输入，并且匹配不识别的最佳结果，则在识别器使用的语法，具有最高`Priority`。

trans-unit.source: If the grammars that produce the identical recognition result also have the same `Priority` value, then the grammar that the recognizer uses is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 如果生成相同的识别结果的语法也具有相同`Priority`值，则在识别器使用的语法是不确定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Priority" name="Priority" href=""></xref> property returns an integer value that represents the relative priority of a specific <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Priority" name="Priority" href=""> </xref>属性返回一个整数值，表示特定的相对优先级<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The range is from -128 to 127 inclusive.
The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value with the name of a binary resource that was used to load the current <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值替换为用于加载当前的二进制资源的名称<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceName" name="ResourceName" href=""></xref> property returns the name of the binary resource from which the strongly-typed grammar, used by <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>, was loaded.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_ResourceName" name="ResourceName" href=""> </xref>属性返回的强类型的语法，通过从其的使用的二进制资源的名称<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref>，已加载。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the root rule or entry point of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取根规则或入口点的名称<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: To construct a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object and set the name for its root rule, use one of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> constructors that takes the `ruleName` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要构造<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象并设置其根规则的名称，请使用之一<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A>构造函数采用`ruleName`参数。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the root rule of a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> has no name, the property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果根规则的<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>具有没有名称，该属性返回`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The root rules of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> instances constructed from <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> objects typically have no name, so RuleName returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 根法则<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>实例构造从<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder>对象通常都有没有名称，因此 RuleName 返回`null`。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.GrammarBuilder> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_RuleName" name="RuleName" href=""></xref> property returns the identifier for the root rule of the referenced speech recognition grammar.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_RuleName" name="RuleName" href=""> </xref>属性返回引用的语音识别语法的根规则的标识符。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raised when a speech recognizer performs recognition using the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 当识别使用语音识别器执行时，引发<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognizer also raises a `SpeechRecognized` event when it recognizes input.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器也会引发`SpeechRecognized`时它可以识别输入的事件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's SpeechRecognized event is raised prior to the speech recognizer's `SpeechRecognized` event .
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>在语音识别器之前引发对象的 SpeechRecognized 事件`SpeechRecognized`事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>, and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> events.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>， <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>，和<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted>事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.RecognizeCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.SpeechRecognized?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Any tasks specific to a particular grammar should always be handled by handlers for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object's SpeechRecognized event.
trans-unit.target: 特定于某个特定的语法的任何任务应始终通过为处理程序来处理<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象的 SpeechRecognized 事件。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_StgInit" name="StgInit" href=""></xref> method initializes a strongly-typed grammar.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_StgInit" name="StgInit" href=""> </xref>方法初始化强类型的语法。

trans-unit.source: A strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object (`IsStg` equals `true`) can return strongly-typed results (objects, rather than raw text) to a client application.
trans-unit.target: 一个强类型<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象 (`IsStg`等于`true`) 可以返回到客户端应用程序的强类型的结果 （对象，而不是原始文本）。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: For example, a strongly-typed grammar might return <xref:System.DateTime> objects rather than raw recognized input.
trans-unit.target: 例如，可能会返回强类型的语法<xref:System.DateTime>对象而不是原始识别的输入。</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: You can implement strongly-typed grammars by attaching code to the rules of a grammar.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过将代码附加到的语法规则实现强类型的语法。

trans-unit.source: As a recognition engine processes any given rule, taking as input the current partial results, the associated code is executed and the textual information becomes rich type objects.
trans-unit.target: 识别引擎处理任何给定的规则，拍摄作为输入当前部分结果、 执行关联的代码和文本信息变得丰富类型对象。

trans-unit.source: This allows a client to more easily make use of enhanced semantic checking, support for multiple cultures, and internal grammar logic.
trans-unit.target: 这允许客户端更轻松地使用增强的语义检查，支持针对多个区域性和内部语法逻辑。

trans-unit.source: Instances of strongly-typed <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects are typically obtained from resources in an assembly as a <xref:System.Type> of the Common Language Runtime (CLR).
trans-unit.target: 强类型的实例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象通常从一个程序集作为中的资源中获取<xref:System.Type>的公共语言运行时 (CLR)。</xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The localized types used to support different languages are examples of such <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> objects.
trans-unit.target: 用于支持不同语言的本地化的类型是这样的示例<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>对象。</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: Parameters to be passed to initialize the strongly-typed grammar.This parameter may be null.
trans-unit.target: 要传递初始化的强类型的语法的参数。此参数可以为 null。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the weight value of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置权重值为<xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref>对象。

trans-unit.source: Because of the complexity of a recognition engine's use of **Weight**, its effect on a particular grammar's performance is not as directly predictable as that of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 由于识别引擎的使用的复杂性**权重**，它对某个特定的语法的性能的影响不可与<xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Priority%2A>为直接预测

trans-unit.source: Speech recognition is a weighted system.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别是加权的系统。

trans-unit.source: It evaluates all possible recognition paths based on a combination of the weight of the grammar, the weights defined for alternatives within the grammar, and the probabilities defined by speech models.
trans-unit.target: 它不计算基于语法的权重，有关该语法中的备选方案定义的权重和定义的语音模型的概率的组合的所有可能识别路径。

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine uses the combination of these weights and probabilities to rank potential alternative recognitions.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别引擎使用这些权重和排名的潜在替代荣誉的概率的组合。

trans-unit.source: Grammars with higher weights will contribute more to the ranking of recognition alternatives than grammars with lower weights.
trans-unit.target: 使用更高版本的权重的语法会提供比语法中的较低的权重来识别替代项的排名的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: The effect of the Weight property on a speech recognizer is dependent on the implementation of the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: 语音识别器权重属性的效果都是依赖于识别器的实现。

trans-unit.source: Although the Weight property can be used to tune the accuracy of speech recognition for an application, it should be used only after controlled diagnostic study of a particular recognition environment and with full information about the recognition engine under use.
trans-unit.target: 尽管权重属性可以用来优化应用程序的语音识别的准确性，它应在受控诊断研究的特定识别环境以及的有关识别引擎下使用的完整信息后才使用它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_Weight" name="Weight" href=""></xref> property returns a floating point value indicating the relative weight that a recognition engine instance should assign to the grammar when processing speech input.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_Weight" name="Weight" href=""> </xref>属性将返回浮点值，该值指示时处理输入语音识别引擎实例应将分配给该语法的相对权重。

trans-unit.source: The range is from 0.0 to 1.0 inclusive.
trans-unit.target: 范围是从 0.0 到 1.0 （含)。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1.0。
